game.name: Montaro 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Montaro, master of stealth, sneakily infiltrating a convenience store with nobody being none the wiser. A stealth game where you manipulate objects and NPCs to complete objectives, "stealing pantsu".
game.shortDescriptionEn: Montaro, master of stealth, sneakily infiltrating a convenience store with nobody being none the wiser. A stealth game where you manipulate objects and NPCs to complete objectives, "stealing pantsu".
